steps: Open the Microsoft Word document Document11.docx.
Place the cursor at the location where you want to insert the check mark symbol.
Go to the 'Insert' tab in the Word ribbon.
Click on the 'Symbol' button in the 'Symbols' group.
A drop-down menu will appear. Select 'More Symbols' from the menu.
In the 'Symbol' dialog box, make sure the 'Symbols' tab is selected.
Scroll through the list of symbols and locate the check mark symbol.
Click on the check mark symbol to select it.
The check mark symbol will be inserted at the cursor position in the Word document.
